titles.title: A bill to make a technical correction relating to the land conveyance authorized by Public Law 108-67.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 109-104.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 2/16/2005--Introduced. Makes a technical correction relating to the description of the conveyance authorized by Public Law 108-67 (a law providing for the conveyance of certain land to the Washoe Indian Tribe of Nevada and California).
